name: Palmier
long_description: We believe that just as AI has revolutionized code development, it can transform every aspect of the software lifecycle, from issue tracking to collaboration, review, merging, and deployment. That’s why we’re building Palmier, the first AI-native software development platform. Palmier deeply integrates AI to assist with code understanding, review, and collaboration directly within your codebase, greatly increasing code reliability and engineering productivity.
